location.name: At the rail near Senator Hancock's Desk

agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Property Tax TIME & DATE: 4:30 PM or upon adjournment/recess Thursday, May 2, 2019 PLACE: At the rail near Senator Hancock's Desk CHAIR: Senator Paul Bettencourt 24 hour posting rule suspended The committee will meet to consider pending business. No public testimony will be taken at this hearing.
